en: could you tell me the date today
can you inform me of the current date
do you know what day it is
fr: pouvez-vous me dire la date du jour

en.date: [The date today is:] dddd [the] Do MMMM, YYYY [and it is] hh:mm a

fr.date: [Aujourd'hui nous sommes le] dddd D MMMM YYYY [et il est] HH [heures] mm
